document_data.mainbody: '''Cymrych Hugh''' was the greatest hero in the known history of the [[Ffolk]] and the first of the High Kings of the [[Moonshae Isles]]. Cymrych was so important to the inhabitants of the Isles that his coronation marked the start of [[Marking the years|their calendar]].
document_data.Possessions: Cymrych Hugh possessed an enchanted [[Sword of Cymrych Hugh|silver sword]], which he used in battle against Kazgoroth. Legends said that the sword had been blessed by the [[Earthmother]] herself.
document_data.Relationships: His first son, who came to be known as Warren I, became High King following Cymrych's death and founded the [[Cymrych Dynasty]] of the Moonshaes. Cymrych's eldest daughter, [[Tamara Cymrych|Tamara]], would go on to become High Queen after Warren, while his second son would come to rule after her as [[Carrig Cymrych|Carrig I]].
